name: Super Clean The Place
description:
Enjoy the simple gifts of dunking the trash into a bin while listening to soothing organization music.

How to play:

- Find trash around the room.

- Rotate the room with A and D.

- Click on trash to make it levitate.

- Dunk the trash into a bin.

- Repeat for all trash in the room.

Hope you enjoy it!

* Not inspired by the famous Japanese organizing consultant nor the Swedish furniture maker.
